auth.aboutPlaceHolder: Web Developer, learned languages HTML5-CSS3-JAVASCRIPT-JQUERY-BOOTSTRAP-PHP-MYSQL-AJAX-JSON-API. I have more than 50 clients with a 5-star rating on various freelancing platforms. I have over 5 years of experience in designing and developing websites and have worked on all kinds of web projects (E-commerce - Portfolio - Educational - Employment). We have worked with various types of companies and organizations (Small companies - Large companies - Government organizations). I can convert PSD, XD, or Figma designs into interactive websites. Just take a look at my work and don't hesitate to contact me :)

home.heroSectionTitle: The Largest Arab Market for Services and Projects
home.heroSectionSubTitle: Open your doors to profit by offering your services
home.bestServicesSubTitle: The most viewed and best-selling services ever
home.newsletterTitle: Stay Connected with Our Creative World
home.latestProjectsSubTitle: The most viewed latest projects in the market
home.partenersSubTitle: Our partners in success and development
home.doYouhaveProject: Do you have a project you want to get done?
home.addProjectDesc: Add the details of the project you need to complete and the required skills, and get offers from specialized freelancers in minutes.
home.savePaymentDesc: Enjoy peace of mind with our secure payment system. Easy communication: Stay connected with your clients and freelancers through our integrated messaging system.
home.showCreativityDesc: Showcase your outstanding work and attract clients who appreciate your unique skills.
home.showCreativityDesc2: Through your portfolio and client reviews, you can build your reputation and attract more projects. The more satisfied clients you have, the greater your chances of success on Ynjez.
home.downloadAppDesc: Start a different experience on the Ynjez app, where you can inquire about your projects.
home.downloadAppDesc2: Enable your team to hire freelancers to meet their skill requirements. Create the right hiring model for your company's workflow. Collaborate with your team on managing projects and freelancers from one place.
home.howItWorks: How to Start Working with Ynjez
home.howItWorksDesc: Starting with Ynjez is easy and simple! Follow these steps and start earning:
home.whyYenjzDesc: Because it combines ease and professionalism.
home.findFreelancersYouNeed: Find Professional Freelancers in All Fields.
home.coverAllYourNeeds: Cover all your skill needs in every specialty.
home.joinYnjezDesc: Be part of a thriving network of professionals and clients. Whether you're a freelancer looking for new opportunities or a company needing skilled experts, Ynjez connects you with the right people to get the job done.

howItWorks.desc1: Create a free account on Yngez in minutes. Enter your basic information and start customizing your profile.
howItWorks.desc2: Clearly showcase your skills and experience on your profile. The more accurate your information, the higher your chances of attracting the right clients.
howItWorks.desc3: Whatever your skills or experience, you'll find opportunities that suit you on Yngez. Discover projects that match your abilities and start working on what you love.
howItWorks.desc4: Prepare professional proposals that demonstrate how you can achieve the client's goals. Make sure your proposal highlights your strengths and explains how you will add value to the project.
howItWorks.desc5: Once your proposal is accepted, communicate with the client and set the details. Work hard and professionally to achieve the agreed-upon results.
howItWorks.desc6: After completing the project, make sure to request a review from the client. Positive reviews help you build a strong reputation and increase your chances of landing future projects.

whyYenjz.desc1: Whatever your skills or experience, you will find opportunities that suit you on Ynjez. Discover projects that match your abilities and start working on what you love.
whyYenjz.desc2: Ynjez offers everything you need in one place, from finding opportunities to managing projects and receiving payments. No need to search multiple sites; everything is easily available to you.
whyYenjz.desc3: If you face any challenges, our customer support team is here to help you at any time. We are committed to providing the necessary support to ensure a hassle-free experience.
whyYenjz.desc4: With Ynjez, you can manage your projects effortlessly. Track progress, communicate with your team, and assign tasks with just a click, ensuring smooth workflow.
whyYenjz.desc5: We care about protecting your rights. Whether you are a freelancer or a client, Ynjez ensures safety and reliability through strict terms of use and a dispute resolution system.
whyYenjz.desc6: Our rating system helps you build your reputation based on real performance. The more positive reviews you receive, the higher your chances of getting new projects.

footer.about: Welcome to the largest Arabic marketplace for buying and selling microservices. We are here to help you achieve your goals easily and securely. You can rely on our platform to complete your tasks and projects at prices that suit you.

addService.titleHint: Choose a concise and clear title that accurately reflects what you will offer in your service, so buyers can find it when searching with relevant keywords related to the service area.
addService.serviceDescriptionHint: Write a distinctive service description in correct and error-free language, explaining in detail what the client will receive upon purchasing the service.
addService.daysHint: The buyer has the right to cancel the service directly if it is delayed beyond the specified time.
addService.galleryHint: Add a representative image of the service along with at least three exclusive samples to introduce the buyer to your working style and skills.
addService.imagesHint: Size: 343x257 pixels. Ratio 4:3. Maximum size: 5 MB. Allowed number: 10 files.
addService.imageLimitReached: The number of allowed images has been exceeded
addService.instructionsHint: Information you need from the buyer to complete the service. This information appears only after the service is purchased.
addService.addMoreDevelopmentHint: Service developments are optional and cannot force the buyer to request them.
addService.moreDevPricePlaceholder: For $5, add to the service price
addService.noChangesMade: No changes detected. Please make some updates before submitting.
